---
title: "New Research Collaboration with MIT"
date: "2024-03-15"
description: "Exciting new partnership with MIT's Software Engineering Lab focusing on automated testing and verification techniques."
link: "#"
---

Our research group has established a new collaboration with MIT's Software Engineering Lab. This partnership will focus on developing advanced techniques for automated software testing and verification. The joint project aims to combine our expertise in CI/CD systems with MIT's work in formal methods.
